messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine you are a film director looking for producers to invest. You can talk to either of your two friends, Nora and Philip. Nora is married to Peter who is friends with Shikha. Shikha knows Gal who can introduce to Alex. Alex can introduce you to David, who can invest $1M in your movie. But you do not take it, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. Philip is friends with Yakub who can introduce you to Ajay. Ajay is friends with Joe who is married to Rachel. Rachel's brother Harry has $5M budget for producing a movie. But you do not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?

First, you will look at the friends that Philip has. You will then look at the friends that Nora has. Then you will look at the friends that Peter has. Then you will look at the friends that Shikha has. Then you will look at the friends that Gal has. Then you will look at the friends that Alex has. Then you will look at the friends that David has. Then you will look at the friends that Ajay has. Then you will look at the friends that Joe has. Then you will look at the friends that Rachel has. Then you will look at the friends that Harry has. Then you will look at the friends that Yakub has.

You will then compare the friends that Nora has to the friends that Philip has. You will then compare the friends that Peter has to the friends that Shikha has. You will then compare the friends that Shikha has to the friends that Gal has. You will then compare the friends that Gal has to the friends that Alex has. You will then compare the friends that Alex has to the friends that David has. You will then compare the friends that David has to the friends that Ajay has. You will then compare the friends that Ajay has to the friends

You find a friendship app where you can be friends with anyone you want. But you have to clearly write the name of the person you want to be friends with. Remember that You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?
